column4: Can you please complain in another channel? This is to get help for issues, not lament about them.
Failtroll. Microsoft doesn't interact with its users. Anyway... my problems are with plymouth and seeming incompatibility with Ubuntu and Xubuntu being installed on the same drive
by same drive, you mean seperate partitions with a shared home folder or something?
No, I installed Ubuntu and then used the Software center to install the Xubuntu desktop package. Since then my desktop randomly does not load themes properly.
